title: Downtown streets and sidewalks are unfriendly to us in wheelchairs. Sidewalks are encumbered by uneven  bricks and not wide enough because of those square tree-protectors and restaurant chairs. Who will fix it and who can we complain to? Pedestrian-friendly should include consideration for wheelchairs at the top of the list!
